Data Fields
core_pinfunc_t Struct Reference
Stratify OS » Device Interface » Core Microcontroller Access

Data structure for setting the pin functionality. More...

#include <core.h>

Detailed Description

This structure is used with I_CORE_SETPINFUNC to set the functionality of pins.

Data Fields

u8 periph_port
 
u8 periph_func
 
mcu_pin_t io
 

Field Documentation

mcu_pin_t core_pinfunc_t::io

PIO port and pin (see mcu_pin_t)

u8 core_pinfunc_t::periph_func

Peripheral port function (see core_periph_t)

◆ periph_port

u8 core_pinfunc_t::periph_port

Peripheral port value (e.g. 0 for I2C0)
